name: Angelo Skate Away
description:
Grind your way through Angelo's world! An epic and challenging skateboard game!



Angelo - Skate Away is a brand new game based on the successful TV show Angelo Rules!
Play Angelo, Lola, Sherwood and many more characters in this epic skate game.
Enjoy skating through such iconic environments as the City, the School, Adventure Land or the Skate-park, in a fun and easy-to-get platformer.
Collect cupcakes and use them to unlock new levels, characters, hats, boards and tricks and become a very unique skater!

  • Play with Angelo and more than 15 other characters from the show.
  • Master 30+ levels and beat them by completing there objectives.
  • More than 30 unique hats to really enjoy the game YOUR way.
  • Battle your friends for leaderboard dominance.
  • Unlock more than 25 sick tricks!
